data.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
data.text:
Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (16-Apr-2004)

Director: Quentin Tarantino

Writer: Quentin Tarantino

Original Music by: Robert Rodriguez; The RZA

Producer: Lawrence Bender

Keywords: Action/Thriller, Martial Arts

Second half of Quentin Tarantino's martial-arts exploitation epic concludes The Bride's revenge saga.

ABSTRACT

See also Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003). The Bride returns for an encore appearance in all her murderous glory in this wrap-up to Quentin Tarantino's martial-arts spectacle, performing battle against Budd and Elle Driver, the last remaining obstacles standing in the way of Bill, the kingpin of an elite squad of assassins who'd betrayed her years earlier and her intended final target.
